prompt:
How do you describe an unconventional museum?
The [Museum of Curiosity](https://www.museumofcuriosity.org/) in [Los Angeles, CA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/los_angeles) is a unique and unconventional museum that focuses on the strange, unusual, and mysterious. It features a wide variety of oddities including anatomical specimens, taxidermy creatures, and even a section devoted to extraterrestrial life.
